channel.title: Legit Quote from the forums
channel.description:
I think this is a very bad choice. What if we are lending stuff to our friends or something! Come on. Dear Players, Jagex is ruining the game left and right! They hate rares, so they decide they can control the price of that before the exchange? Funny eh? Jagex thinks they can control the prices of everything.. I mean come on. Not let us give stuff to our friends for free or anything? This is ruining the game alot because now we can not merchant.. Well we can but wee will be merchanting a hole 3k! OMG alot!! NOT! Jagex, Can you make it atleast like 100k cap? Suggestion: Why not make it a 10k Cap for new players, because then you can ban all the people you see selling. But for people that joined a couple months ago, say before the new 3k cap on new players, we can trade any ammount. Then sellers can not create a new account and sell on them. Isn't this a good idea?
I like the part about the 10k cap for new players to be permanent but old players can trade any ammount. http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?27,28,327,55142352

item.title: Legit Quote from the forums
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

zoss0:

I meant how days/weeks/months until the cap raises?

It’s purely conjecture.

Read full topic

item.title: Legit Quote from the forums
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:4, topic:168957”][quote author=zoss0 link=topic=228603.msg1962718#msg1962718 date=1199002769]
Over…how long?
[/quote]
over 9000

I don’t think Jagex will take any new ideas into consideration, other then their own.
This 10k cap and all that will never come, I like it though.[/quote]
I meant how days/weeks/months until the cap raises?

Read full topic

I don’t think Jagex will take any new ideas into consideration, other then their own.

item.title: Legit Quote from the forums
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Lol that’s not what he said, and that’s not what he meant. New players temporarily get 10k cap. Then it increases from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Legit Quote from the forums
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

I think this is a very bad choice. What if we are lending stuff to our friends or something!

Come on.

Dear Players,

Jagex is ruining the game left and right! They hate rares, so they decide they can control the price of that before the exchange? Funny eh? Jagex thinks they can control the prices of everything… I mean come on. Not let us give stuff to our friends for free or anything?

This is ruining the game alot because now we can not merchant…

Well we can but wee will be merchanting a hole 3k! OMG alot!!

NOT! Jagex, Can you make it atleast like 100k cap?

Suggestion: Why not make it a 10k Cap for new players, because then you can ban all the people you see selling.

But for people that joined a couple months ago, say before the new 3k cap on new players, we can trade any ammount.

Then sellers can not create a new account and sell on them.

Isn’t this a good idea?

I like the part about the 10k cap for new players to be permanent but old players can trade any ammount.

http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?27,28,327,55142352

Read full topic
